name: Smiling Face with Halo
baseMeaning: A yellow face with a slight smile and a golden halo above its head.
tldr: Pretending to be innocent or angelic. Often sarcastic or after being mischievous.

contextMeanings.meaning: Pretending to be innocent after doing something questionable.

contextMeanings.meaning: Genuine expression of goodness or kindness.

platformNotes.note: Often used sarcastically when definitely not being innocent.
The 'I'm being good' (but probably not) emoji.
Used in captions to appear sweet or wholesome.

generationalNotes.note: Mix of genuine and ironic usage.
May use more genuinely for good deeds.
